text: "Same Ole Love (365 Days a Year)" is a 1987 song by Anita Baker and is the third single from her second studio album Rapture. It went to number 44 in the United States and number 6 on the Billboard Adult Contemporary charts. == References == Category:1987 songs Category:R&B; songs Category:Soul songs Category:Anita Baker songs
title: Same Ole Love (365 Days a Year)
